layers.title: Transport accessibility
layers.desc: An index created to show transport accessibilty across the North of England. This builds on the Open Journey Time work by Open Innovations for Transport for the North.

layers.title: ULEVs
layers.desc: A representative value for ULEVs registered per MSOA in Q3 2021.

layers.title: Estimated car park capacity
layers.desc: An estimate of the total capacity for car parks. This uses an extract of car parks from OpenStreetMap. Where a car park has a capacity attributes set we use those. If the capacity attribute is not set we estimate the capacity from a scaling of the area.

layers.title: Home charging points
layers.desc: A value representing charging devices installed as part of the Electric Vehicle Homecharge Scheme (EVHS) as of 1 October 2021. The data are originally provided by Postcode District and have been apportioned to MSOA by the distribution of postcodes.

layers.title: Existing chargepoints
layers.desc: The number of chargepoints in the National Chargepoint Registry.

layers.title: Distribution Centres
layers.desc: An estimate of the size of distribution centres. This uses an extract of car parks from OpenStreetMap where name=*Distribution*.
